page.title: 05Ruth Miller's Sunday.
page.content: I dragged myself out of bed.It was a horrible wet morning,my bed was in a mess.Mum and Dad were downstairs already. Mum had just finished her toast.Dad was starting his grapefruit. I sat down in my chair,put my serviette on my lap,and started my grapefruit.After breakfast we got dressed.Then we went to church.I have been going to the Minster for about 9 or 10 years.When we got back I dusted my bedroom,then went out to play with my friend Kirsty.At 1-30pm I had my lunch.We had beef,roast potatoes, yorkshire puddings and Dads own cabbage.(This is grown on his allotment.) Then I went out to play again.We played 999,British Bulldogs and three bad eggs.At 6-30pm we had tea,Ihad a piece of cake,a chocolate biscuit and three pieces of bread.I washed my hair and got ready for bed.
